content: *honor the police officer or the child who dreams of being one with this special wool-ease throw each block is stitched in a solid color after which the images are created with duplicate or cross stitch lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 20128cad corrections applied sep 20 2002 skill level intermediate level 3 wool-ease® article #620 12 colors 23 balls total size h-8 5 mm flexible afghan stitch hook each panel is worked in afghan stitch background with cross stitch embroidered motif color charts are provided for embroidery pattern sew panels together finish with crocheted picot border see commemorative police throw knit 1 for the knit version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/commemorative-police-throw-knit
